T02TD3053E:105b-1: hya gr'i wa s'a dha nam /
T02TD3053E:105b-4: 'phags pa rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3053E:105b-5: bde sbyin bcom ldan rta mgrin ni //
T02TD3053E:105b-6: g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD3053E:105b-7: khams gsum rang bzhin gsum spyan gsum //
T02TD3053E:105b-8: de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3053E:105b-9: dang por sngags ni rab tu brjod /
T02TD3053E:105b-10: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha: sarba dharm'a sva bh'a wa bi shuddhonyah'um /
T02TD3053E:105b-11: lan gsum brjod pas snang srid kyi //
T02TD3053E:105b-12: dngos rnams thams cad dag par bsam //
T02TD3053E:105b-13: khyad par rang lus shel sgong ltar //
T02TD3053E:106a-3: zhags pa lcags kyu ltar 'phros pas //
T02TD3053E:106a-4: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD3053E:106a-5: rta mgrin bla ma la sogs pa //
T02TD3053E:106a-6: mdun du spyan drangs rang snying ba //
T02TD3053E:106a-7: hr'i: las mchod ba'i lha mo ni //
T02TD3053E:106a-8: bdug spos ser mo phyag na spos //
T02TD3053E:106a-9: me tog ma ni autpal bsnams //
T02TD3053E:106a-10: sku ni rab tu mthing gar bzhugs //
T02TD3053E:106a-11: mar me ma ni sku mdog dmar //
T02TD3053E:106a-12: phyag na rin chen sgron ma 'dzin //
T02TD3053E:106a-13: dri chab ma ni ljang gu ste //
T02TD3053E:106a-14: lag na gser gyi bum 'dzin ma //
T02TD3053E:106a-15: zhal zas ma ni sku mdog dkar //
T02TD3053E:106a-16: lag na gser gzhong bdud rtsis gang //
T02TD3053E:106a-17: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3053E:106a-18: aom badzra pushpe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3053E:106a-19: aom badzra a'a lo ke a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3053E:106a-20: aom badzra gandhe a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3053E:106a-21: aom badzra nee bi dye a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD3053E:106a-22: gang yang bdag gis dus kun du //
T02TD3053E:106a-23: sdig pa bgyis par gang gyur pa //
T02TD3053E:106a-25: deng nas brtsams te 'byung mi bgyid ;
T02TD3053E:106a-26: / dge ba rnams la rjes yi rang //
T02TD3053E:106a-27: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD3053E:106a-28: thams cad byang chub mchog tu bsngo //
T02TD3053E:106a-29: de thob lam la gnas bgyid cing //
T02TD3053E:106a-30: dam pa'i skyabs gsum la skyabs mchi //
T02TD3053E:106a-31: de rjes tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom //
T02TD3053E:106a-32: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02TD3053E:106a-33: lan gsum brjod bya ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD3053E:106a-34: chos ni thams cad stong par bsam //
T02TD3053E:106a-35: de yi ngang las mkha' dkyil du //
T02TD3053E:106a-37: de steng yi ge h'um las ni //
T02TD3053E:106a-39: rdo rje ra bas gzhi gur //
T02TD3053E:106a-40: de yi dbus su nyi dkyil 'khor //
T02TD3053E:106a-41: de sting yi ge bhr'um dkar bsam ;
T02TD3053E:106a-42: / de las 'od zer byung bas ni //
T02TD3053E:106a-43: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang //
T02TD3053E:106a-44: dung dang bee d'urya dang shel //
T02TD3053E:106a-45: gser las grub pa'i rim pa bzhin //
T02TD3053E:106a-46: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD3053E:106a-47: gser gyi ka pa brgyad kyis bteg / rin chen du mas steng ni phub //
T02TD3053E:106a-49: yang na thod pa'i gzhal yas khang //
T02TD3053E:106a-50: stong gsum stong chen rgya khyon tsam //
T02TD3053E:106a-51: steng ni zhing gis rab tu bkab //
T02TD3053E:106a-52: gru bzhi pa ni rab tu bkod //
T02TD3053E:106a-53: seng ldeng ka ba brgyad ni gnas //
T02TD3053E:106a-54: thod pa brgyad kyis ka zhu brgyan //
T02TD3053E:106a-55: phyi dang nang ni rab tu gsal //
T02TD3053E:106a-56: rang ni ram ser gcig tu bsgom //
T02TD3053E:106b-0: @106b nyi dkyil steng du hr'i: dmar po //
T02TD3053E:106b-2: don byas 'phags pa mchod nas ni //
T02TD3053E:106b-3: slar yang 'od ni hr'i: la thim //
T02TD3053E:106b-4: de nyid zhu bas thog ma nas //
T02TD3053E:106b-5: bsags pa'i sgrib gnyis ye shes kyi //
T02TD3053E:106b-6: mes ni rab tu bsregs par bsam //
T02TD3053E:106b-8: / sngar bzhin rab tu bsgom par bya //
T02TD3053E:106b-9: rang ni bcom ldan dpal rta mgrin //
T02TD3053E:106b-10: dbu gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar //
T02TD3053E:106b-11: dbus dang g-yas dang g-yon dang ni //
T02TD3053E:106b-12: dmar dang dkar dang nag po yi //
T02TD3053E:106b-13: sbyan gsum dbu steng rta mgo can //
T02TD3053E:106b-14: ljang gu gsum ni rab tu 'thon //
T02TD3053E:106b-15: tshems gtsigs zhal nas 'brug ni sgrogs //
T02TD3053E:106b-16: thod skam thod byas thod rlon brgyan //
T02TD3053E:106b-17: yan lag brang 'gros rab tu brgyan //
T02TD3053E:106b-18: stag gi sham thabs glang lpags gyon //
T02TD3053E:106b-19: phyag g-yas rdo rje g-yon na khrab //
T02TD3053E:106b-20: g-yas kyi gnyis pas gser zhags bsnams //
T02TD3053E:106b-21: g-yas kyi tha ma seng ldeng dbyug / g-yon gyi gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin //
T02TD3053E:106b-22: g-yon gyi tha ma sor mo las //
T02TD3053E:106b-23: bya khyung bye ba bye ba 'gyed //
T02TD3053E:106b-24: zhabs ni drug gis klu rnams mnan //
T02TD3053E:106b-25: bskal pa'i me ltar dbus na bzhugs //
T02TD3053E:106b-26: spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru //
T02TD3053E:106b-27: aom a'a: h'um dkar dmar dang gnag / snying ga'i rdo rje rtse lnga las //
T02TD3053E:106b-30: tshe dpag med dang don yod grub //
T02TD3053E:106b-31: mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs la //
T02TD3053E:106b-32: aom dang h'um dang tr'am hr'i: aa //
T02TD3053E:106b-33: spyi bo dpral ba rna ba g-yas //
T02TD3053E:106b-34: ltag pa rna ba g-yon pa ru /
T02TD3053E:106b-35: bdud rtsi'i bum pas dbang bskur bsam //
T02TD3053E:106b-36: snying ga'i rdo rje rgya gram las//
T02TD3053E:106b-38: ye nas grub pa'i rta mgrin ni //
T02TD3053E:106b-39: nyi dkyil bzhugs pas spyan drangs la //
T02TD3053E:106b-41: lha mo lngas ni mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD3053E:106b-42: rgya gram de yi chang pa la //
T02TD3053E:106b-43: dza: h'um bam ho: rab tu gsal //
T02TD3053E:106b-44: dza: las rta mgrin spyan drang bya //
T02TD3053E:106b-45: h'um gis rab tu gzhug par bya //
T02TD3053E:106b-46: bam gis rab tu bcing bar bya //
T02TD3053E:106b-47: ho: sa ni de la gzhug par bya /
T02TD3053E:106b-48: bsgom pas dub par gyur na ni //
T02TD3053E:106b-49: bzlas pa yang ni brjod bya ste //
T02TD3053E:106b-50: aa tshar ka tshar bkod byas la //
T02TD3053E:106b-51: sde tshan dang po'i bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD3053E:106b-52: sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan //
T02TD3053E:106b-53: de nyid kyis ni gsum pa bzung //
T02TD3053E:107a-2: sde tshan bdun pa'i gnyis par sbyar //
T02TD3053E:107a-3: sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po blang //
T02TD3053E:107a-4: sde tshan dang po'i bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD3053E:107a-5: sde tshan bdun pa'i gnyis pa sbyar //
T02TD3053E:107a-6: sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po bzung //
T02TD3053E:107a-7: drod kyi yi ge bzhi pa blang //
T02TD3053E:107a-8: mthar gnas pa yi dang po bzung //
T02TD3053E:107a-9: snge tshan gnyis pa'i gsum ba blang //
T02TD3053E:107a-10: mthar gnas yi ge gnyis pa sbyar //
T02TD3053E:107a-11: sde tshan dang po'i gsum pas brgyan //
T02TD3053E:107a-12: mthar gnas bzhi po gzung bar bya //
T02TD3053E:107a-13: drod kyi bzhi ba blang byas la //
T02TD3053E:107a-14: sde tshan dang po'i lnga pa sbyar //
T02TD3053E:107a-15: mthar gnas gsum pa blang byas la //
T02TD3053E:107a-16: sde tshan dang po'i lnga pa sbyin //
T02TD3053E:107a-17: lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya //
T02TD3053E:107a-18: drod kyi bzhi pa gzung byas la //
T02TD3053E:107a-19: sde tshan dang po'i drug pa sbyar //
T02TD3053E:107a-20: sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa sbyin //
T02TD3053E:107a-21: sde tshan lnga pa'i gnyis pa blang //
T02TD3053E:107a-22: sde tshan gsum pa'i dang po sbyin //
T02TD3053E:107a-24: nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs rta mgrin du //
T02TD3053E:107a-25: bzlas pas dub na ye shes ni //
T02TD3053E:107a-26: sems dpa' mdun du spyan drangs la //
T02TD3053E:107a-27: lha mo lngas ni sngar bzhin du //
T02TD3053E:107a-28: yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya //
T02TD3053E:107a-29: de rjes bstod pa yang ni brjod //
T02TD3053E:107a-30: gshegs phyir dza: dza: lan gsum brjod //
T02TD3053E:107a-31: rang ni rta mgrin bsgoms pa yis //
T02TD3053E:107a-32: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD3053E:107a-33: hr'i: dmang po las phyogs bcu ru //
T02TD3053E:107a-35: thams cad rta mgrin rang bzhin du //
T02TD3053E:107a-36: 'od ni rang gi lus la bsdu //
T02TD3053E:107a-37: dam tshig ye shes sems dpa' la //
T02TD3053E:107a-38: de ni hr'i: la rab tu bsdu //
T02TD3053E:107a-39: de ni dkar la yungs kar tsam //
T02TD3053E:107a-40: de ni rab tu dmigs mi bya //
T02TD3053E:107a-41: gsal la mi rtog gcig tu bsam //
T02TD3053E:107a-42: lha yi bu dang lha klu dang //
T02TD3053E:107a-43: bdag gzhan sdug bsngal zhi ba dang //
T02TD3053E:107a-44: bgegs rigs gzhan ni 'dul ba dang //
T02TD3053E:107a-46: lha 'dre mthu chen klu ma rungs //
T02TD3053E:107a-47: ser ba bsrung bar 'dod pa yis //
T02TD3053E:107a-48: yungs kar brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas //
T02TD3053E:107a-49: gtor ma gtong bar 'dod pa yis //
T02TD3053E:107a-50: rang ni yi dam lha ru gnas //
T02TD3053E:107a-51: snying gar hr'i: dmar phyogs bcu yi //
T02TD3053E:107a-53: gtor ma'i steng du spyan drangs la //
T02TD3053E:107a-54: gtor steng bam dmar po ni bsam //
T02TD3053E:107a-56: gtor ma rnam par dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD3053E:107a-57: sarba ka ri lan bdun brjod //
T02TD3053E:107b-0: de nyid @107b bdud rtsir bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD3053E:107b-1: na ma: sarba tath'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te /
T02TD3053E:107b-2: aom sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um /
T02TD3053E:107b-3: nyi shu rtsa gcig ces brjod la //
T02TD3053E:107b-4: yang na lan bdun tshan bzhi brjod //
T02TD3053E:107b-5: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs /
T02TD3053E:107b-6: slob dpon n'a g'a rdzu nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD3053E:107b-9: // / dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
